rationale: Assessed as Least Concern due to its large distribution and no current major threat. Though this species is harvested, there is not at present any evidence that this poses a major threat to B. rousseauxii. Monitoring of this species should take place because of possible future threats acting on it.
evaluator: Collen, B., Darwall, W., Ram, M. & Smith, K. (SRLI Freshwater Fish Evaluation Workshop)
